DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Effective Liver Volume Irradiated Percent Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number value in percent of the effective liver tissue volume exposed to radiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Effective Liver Volume Percent Unit Irradiation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._Existing in fact and ready for service._A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate._The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container._A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred)._Treatment with radiation, generally meaning exposure to ionizing radiation or radiation of wavelengths shorter than those of visible light.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredName: Effective Liver Volume Percent Unit Irradiation
Property.preferredDefinition: Existing in fact and ready for service.:A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate.:The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.:A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).:Treated with radiation.

Concepts.definition: Existing in fact and ready for service.

A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate.
The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: Princess Margaret Cancer Centre, Toronto, ON

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: VD v1.1 replaces v1.0 with a name change.

DataElement.origin: Princess Margaret Cancer Centre, Toronto, ON
DataElement.changeDescription: Created for Auditi SBRT request 11.14.17 mc
